timeline.bodyText: do we want to add all these imports?
timeline.author: MiniDigger

replies.bodyText: Might as well just move them to their own block to avoid conflicts as much as possible? Fully qualified names are fine too, but I'd argue it's much more readable with imports :p
replies.author: Proximyst

replies.bodyText: yeah, one big block is prolly fine
replies.author: MiniDigger
